column2: $ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ War to Make $DEFENDER$ a Mandala Subjects

§Y$TARGET$§! is weak, but if they would just pay you tribute in the form of gold and soldiers you could protect them!

Through war you can force any Mandala realm that you or one of your §YMandala subjects§! border to pay you §Y30%§! of their income and §Y5%§! of their levy reinforcements as tribute.
Will only break free if the §YCakravartin§! has §Rnegative§! §YPrestige§!, is §RNOT§! §YIndependent§!, has §Rless§! §YRealm Size§! than the §YMandala subjects§! or §Rdeclines a defensive§! §YCall to Arms§! from the §YTributary State§!.
This type of §YTributary§! can be called to war.
